# ContractRoles class

Handle contract permissions

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
const rolesAndMembers = await contract.roles.getAll();
await contract.roles.grantRole("admin", "0x...");
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                   | Modifiers | Description                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, roles)](./sdk.contractroles._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ContractRoles</code> class |

## Properties

| Property                                          | Modifiers | Type          | Description |
| ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------- | ----------- |
| [featureName](./sdk.contractroles.featurename.md) |           | "Permissions" |             |

## Methods

| Method                                                      | Modifiers | Description                                      |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| [get(role)](./sdk.contractroles.get.md)                     |           | Get all members of a specific role               |
| [getAll()](./sdk.contractroles.getall.md)                   |           | Get all members of all roles                     |
| [grant(role, address)](./sdk.contractroles.grant.md)        |           | Grant a role to a specific address               |
| [revoke(role, address)](./sdk.contractroles.revoke.md)      |           | Revoke a role from a specific address            |
| [setAll(rolesWithAddresses)](./sdk.contractroles.setall.md) |           | Overwrite the list of members for specific roles |

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractRoles<TContract extends IPermissions, TRole extends Role> implements DetectableFeature
```

**Implements:** DetectableFeature

## Remarks

Configure roles and permissions for a contract, to restrict certain actions.
